title: ekko is not in the store anyone know if he was removed or do i need to repair client
body: anyone know if he was removed or do i need to repair client?

replies.body: i dont remember buying ekko but thank you for pointing that out.
I looked into this for you, and it looks like you have Ekko owned.  He won't show up in the store, but you'll be bale to locate him in your collection!  #$clears

replies.poster: Q r a f T e e
replies.body: He's in the store for me, you sure you don't already have him?
